description_for_human: Complete AI toolkit for documentation - scrape, generate MCP servers, create chatbots, add vector search, and publish Mintlify sites.
description_for_model: This toolkit helps AI agents work with documentation. It can: 1) Scrape any Mintlify documentation site 10-100x faster using Trieve API, 2) Generate complete MCP servers for Claude Desktop, 3) Create vector search indexes for semantic discovery, 4) Export chatbot training data for GPT/Claude/LLaMA fine-tuning, 5) Publish beautiful Mintlify documentation sites with all components. Perfect for: automating documentation workflows, building AI assistants from docs, creating searchable knowledge bases, and migrating/rebranding documentation.
